org.joyrest.exception.configuration

Class TypedExceptionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joyrest.exception.configuration.AbstractExceptionConfiguration
      • org.joyrest.exception.configuration.TypedExceptionConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionConfiguration

    public abstract class TypedExceptionConfiguration
extends AbstractExceptionConfiguration
    Helper class for a registering exception handlers in exception configuration and subsequently configuring in application context.
    Author:
    pbouda
    See Also:
    AbstractExceptionConfiguration

      • handle

        protected final <T extends Exception,RESP> ExceptionHandler handle(Class<T> clazz,
                                                                   ExceptionHandlerAction<RESP,T> action)
        Method registers a new handler to some type of exception.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the thrown exception
        RESP - type of the returned object
        Parameters:
        clazz - type of the exception to which is handler registered
        action - action that is performed when the proper exception is thrown
        Returns:
        registered exception handler

      • handle

        RESP - type of the returned object
        Parameters:
        clazz - type of the exception to which is handler registered
        action - action that is performed when the proper exception is thrown
